title: To whoever made Kled's login screen music
body: It is honestly my favorite login screen music I've ever heard thank you so much {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Thanks so much! I had a great time working on Kled's music. The first time I heard his VO I was like "I *must* write that guy's music!". 

Thanks for listening!

Ed the Conqueror

> [{quoted}](name=Kangaroo 7,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=37abJsv5,comment-id=00020004,timestamp=2019-02-22T04:09:18.354+0000)
>
> Hey I know it's few years l8ter but is there any chance y'all could upload the champion themes to spotify?
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
> 
> pls

Trust me when I say we're working on it. It pains as much as you guys. Thanks for your patience!

Wait? So are you the only composer guy who makes music for LoL stuff? Did they fire the previous composer and riot said "bruh you suck gtfo" and saw u and said "holy sht this guy is a fking prodigy, ur freaking hired." are u the only composer?

> [{quoted}](name=Astrophel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=37abJsv5,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2016-08-12T01:04:21.838+0000)
>
> Wait? So are you the only composer guy who makes music for LoL stuff? Did they fire the previous composer and riot said "bruh you suck gtfo" and saw u and said "holy sht this guy is a fking prodigy, ur freaking hired." are u the only composer?

Haha! Nah, there's four of us, and they have talents I don't :)

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=37abJsv5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-11T18:24:55.888+0000)
>
> Thanks so much! I had a great time working on Kled's music. The first time I heard his VO I was like "I *must* write that guy's music!". 
> 
> Thanks for listening!
> 
> Ed the Conqueror

Great music theme, indeed!

I have a question, if you don't mind... did you used a dulcimer as inspiration, maybe? I have a disscussion with my friends about that XD

(This theme reminds me of _Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows_...)

> [{quoted}](name=EstaMujer,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=37abJsv5,comment-id=00020003,timestamp=2016-08-14T17:09:11.509+0000)
>
> Great music theme, indeed!
> 
> I have a question, if you don't mind... did you used a dulcimer as inspiration, maybe? I have a disscussion with my friends about that XD
> 
> (This theme reminds me of _Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows_...)

Hey!

There is some dulcimer in there, but most of the melodic texture is carried out by guitars, dobro, mandolin and banjo!
Loved the music in that movie. Good stuff.
Aight... I usually have login music muted but I'll give it a listen :)
Thumbs up to rito audio dept for making great music.

Is it DRAVEN DRAVEN?
No?
It's second at best.
